xwikidoc.name: XWikiPreferences

xwikidoc.author: XWiki.adminPolx
xwikidoc.title: XWiki Preferences

colorTheme.name: colorTheme
colorTheme.sql: select doc.fullName, doc.title from XWikiDocument as doc, BaseObject as theme where doc.fullName=theme.name and theme.className='ColorThemes.ColorThemeClass' and doc.fullName<>'ColorThemes.ColorThemeTemplate'

guest_comment_requires_captcha.name: guest_comment_requires_captcha
guest_comment_requires_captcha.prettyName: Enable CAPTCHA in Comments for Unregistered Users

colorTheme.name: colorTheme
colorTheme.sql: select doc.fullName, doc.title from XWikiDocument as doc, BaseObject as theme where doc.fullName=theme.name and theme.className='ColorThemes.ColorThemeClass' and doc.fullName<>'ColorThemes.ColorThemeTemplate'

guest_comment_requires_captcha.name: guest_comment_requires_captcha
guest_comment_requires_captcha.prettyName: Enable CAPTCHA in Comments for Unregistered Users

property.confirmation_email_content:
#set($nl = $xwiki.getNl()) From: Curriki Confirmation <$sender>${nl}To: $email${nl}Subject: Thank You for Joining Curriki
THANKS FOR JOINING CURRIKI!
You have selected $xwikiname.replaceAll("XWiki.","") as your member login.
You are now a member of a community of thousands of educators from around the world who are committed to using and sharing free and open education resources.
It is through community member participation that Curriki is able to offer thousands of free lessons, units, educational videos, and professional networking resources. As a member, you can use tools for building or posting your own curricula to share with teachers and students around the globe -- many from schools that would not be able to afford these resources otherwise.
START ENJOYING CURRIKI TODAY
- Log In Visit http://www.curriki.org/ to enter your member login and password, then click the orange "Go" button. If you forget your password, click "Forgot Login" under the orange "Go" button.
- Edit Your Profile Once logged in, add a photo or image and a bio to your profile.
- Find Resources Click FIND on the Curriki homepage to begin accessing and collecting resources.
- Share Resources Click CONTRIBUTE on the Curriki homepage to share your own teaching and learning materials.
- Collaborate with Educators Click CONNECT on the Curriki homepage to join or create a group.
GET MORE FROM YOUR MEMBERSHIP
- Explore Learn about new and notable content additions, Curriki's work around the world, and Open Educational Resources via the Curriki blog featured in the ABOUT CURRIKI section, accessible from the left navigation menu.
- Network Network with other members of the Curriki global education community via Twitter (@Curriki) and the Curriki groups on Facebook and LinkedIn.
- Optimize Curriki is optimized for use with the Firefox 3 browser. Learn more about the best settings for using Curriki in the Help Collection, accessible from the left navigation menu.
Thanks again for joining. Enjoy Curriki!
Sincerely, Curriki

property.meta: <meta name="revisit-after" content="7 days" /> <meta name="description" content="Curriki, the online education community, is building the first website to offer free, open-source instructional materials for K-12. We have thousands of free worksheets, lesson plans, exams, project ideas and activities for English language arts, math, science, social studies, technology integration and other subjects. All of our educational material is contributed by teachers and partners and is free and open source." /> <meta name="keywords" content="education, curriculum, curricula, open-source, worksheets, lesson plans, exams, project ideas, activities, English language arts, Math, Science, Social Studies, educational, instructional materials, teachers, educators, teaching" /> <meta name="distribution" content="GLOBAL" /> <meta name="rating" content="General" /> <meta name="copyright" content="you need to choose your copyright" /> <meta name="author" content="" /> <meta http-equiv="reply-to" content="" /> <meta name="language" content="en" /> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" /> <link rel="alternate" type="application/rss+xml" title="Wiki RSS Feed" href="/xwiki/bin/view/Main/WebRss?xpage=rdf" /> <link rel="alternate" type="application/rss+xml" title="Blog RSS Feed" href="http://blog.curriki.org/feed/" />

property.validation_email_content:
#set($nl = $xwiki.getNl()) From: Curriki Confirmation <$sender>${nl}To: $email${nl}Subject: Curriki Registration -- Action Needed
#if($request.getParameter("XWiki.XWikiUsers_0_member_type")=="corporation")We are happy to count your company among Curriki's corporate members! #else Thank you for becoming a Curriki member! #end
Please click this link to complete registration. http://$xwiki.getXWiki().Param('curriki.system.hostname', 'www.curriki.org')/xwiki/bin/view/Registration/CompleteCaller?xwikiname=$xwikiname&validkey=$validkey If the link does not open your browser, please cut and paste the link into your browser.
- The Curriki Community

xwikidoc.renderedcontent: admin.${editor}
